billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Relates to providing financing and construction of capital facilities for Williamsburg Infant and Early Childhood Development Center
summary: Relates to providing financing and construction of capital facilities for Williamsburg Infant and Early Childhood Development Center.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 2326                                                  A. 2440

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN  SENATE  --  Introduced  by  Sen.  SQUADRON -- read twice and ordered
         printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee  on  Corpo-
         rations, Authorities and Commissions

       IN  ASSEMBLY  -- Introduced by M. of A. LENTOL -- read once and referred
         to the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law,  in  relation  to  providing
         financing  and  construction  of  capital  facilities for Williamsburg
         Infant and Early Childhood Development Center

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  (b)  of  subdivision  2 of section 1676 of the
    2  public authorities law is amended by adding a new undesignated paragraph
    3  to read as follows:
    4    WILLIAMSBURG INFANT AND  EARLY  CHILDHOOD  DEVELOPMENT  CENTER  AT  22
    5  MIDDLETON STREET, BROOKLYN, NEW YORK.
    6    S  2.  Subdivision  1 of section 1680 of the public authorities law is
    7  amended by adding a new undesignated paragraph to read as follows:
    8    WILLIAMSBURG INFANT AND  EARLY  CHILDHOOD  DEVELOPMENT  CENTER  AT  22
    9  MIDDLETON STREET, BROOKLYN, NEW YORK.
   10    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04648-01-1
memo:
BILL NUMBER:S2326

TITLE OF BILL:
An act
to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing financing
and construction of capital facilities for Williamsburg Infant and
Early Childhood Development Center

PURPOSE OR GENERAL IDEA OF BILL:
To provide financing and construction
of capital facilities for Williamsburg Infant and Early Childhood
Development Center.

SUMMARY OF SPECIFIC PROVISIONS:
Paragraph (b) of subdivision 2 of
section 1676 and subdivision 1 of section 1680 of the Public
Authorities Law are amended

JUSTIFICATION:
Williamsburg Infant and Early Childhood Development
Center opened in 1985, serving children with disabilities starting
with only 4 students; they now serve 80 and have a waiting list over
20 students long. This bill will allow the Williamsburg Infant and
Early Childhood Development Center to borrow construction capital
from DASNY at a reduced interest rate so as to allow the center to
increase in size to accommodate a 180 student enrollment.

PRIOR LEGISLATIVE HISTORY:
New for 2011.

FISCAL IMPLICATIONS:
Positive for New York State.

EFFECTIVE DATE:
Immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing financing and construction of capital facilities for Williamsburg Infant and Early Childhood Development Center
